name: The Other Side (DracoFearyGaming)
description: Seizure Warnings:  Second Door Key Is Right In front of Door On Ground, Sorry For Crap Placing, Hello there and welcome to "The Other Side" this is a very small demo project that i am working on. However I have added some sort of ending for right now of course. Game is in a super early test build.  I'm simply putting it out now to see how people react to it. Anyways the story: You were sent to this house by the G.H.A (Ghost Hunter Association) To Figure Out why there was so much spiritual energy coming from this House, But in doing so you encounter something that is not apart of this world...
